basicInfo.parentCompany: Independent (privately held; founded in Bulgaria, HQ moved to Dallas, TX)
basicInfo.notes: Founded in 2007, originally in Bulgaria, now headquartered in Dallas, Texas. Known for proprietary SPanel control panel (free cPanel alternative) and SShield AI-powered security. Partners with AWS and DigitalOcean for cloud infrastructure. Over 700,000 websites hosted. Focus on managed VPS hosting with innovative technology solutions.

pricing.moneyBackExclusions: 30-day full refund; Domain fees non-refundable; VPS/cloud services eligible for prorated refund

serverPerformance.ddosProtectionLevel: Advanced DDoS protection on all plans

securitySsl.backupFrequency: Daily (7-day retention on shared; 30-day on VPS)

policiesOverages.bandwidthOveragePolicy: Unmetered within fair use; excessive use may require upgrade
policiesOverages.accountSuspensionPolicy: Violation of ToS; non-payment; resource abuse
policiesOverages.resourceAbuseDefinition: Excessive CPU/memory usage; spam; illegal activities
policiesOverages.hiddenFeesNotes: SPanel included free (saves cPanel license cost); Free migrations; Domain privacy included; Renewal prices reasonable compared to competitors; VPS pricing consistent (no promo markup)

contentRestrictions.proxyVpnNotes: Proxies explicitly banned per knowledge base

business.affiliateCommissionAmount: $50-$500 per sale based on performance; 60-day cookie; Monthly PayPal payments

editorial.knownIssues: Smaller company compared to major hosts; SPanel learning curve for cPanel users; No dedicated servers offered; Some advanced features only on higher tiers; Limited phone support availability reported by some users
editorial.bestFor: Users wanting cPanel alternative without license fees; Managed VPS hosting at affordable prices; WordPress users needing staging and optimization; Small businesses wanting reliable support; Users who value security features (SShield)
editorial.avoidIf: Need dedicated server hosting; Prefer traditional cPanel interface; Need HIPAA/PCI compliance; Want largest provider brand recognition; Need extensive data center choices
editorial.competitorComparisonNotes: SPanel unique value proposition (saves $15-45/mo cPanel costs); Exceptionally high Trustpilot rating (4.9); Free unlimited migrations (vs 1 site at A2/SiteGround); Managed VPS pricing competitive with unmanaged competitors; SShield security included free; AWS-backed infrastructure; A+ BBB rating shows good business practices

comparisonData.uniqueSellingPoint: Free SPanel control panel eliminating cPanel licensing costs plus SShield AI security
comparisonData.idealCustomerProfile: User wanting managed VPS performance without cPanel licensing costs and strong security

faqContent.faqIsThisHostGood: ScalaHosting is excellent for managed VPS hosting with their proprietary SPanel (free cPanel alternative) and SShield security. They have an exceptional 4.9 Trustpilot rating and A+ BBB rating.
faqContent.faqWhoOwnsThisHost: ScalaHosting is independently owned and privately held. Founded in Bulgaria in 2007, the company is now headquartered in Dallas, Texas.
faqContent.faqHowMuchDoesItCost: ScalaHosting shared hosting starts at $2.95/month (renews at $6.95). Managed VPS starts at $20/month with no promo pricing games.
faqContent.faqIsItBeginnerFriendly: Yes, ScalaHosting offers a user-friendly SPanel interface, one-click WordPress installation, and 24/7 support. The free migrations make switching easy.
faqContent.faqDoesItIncludeEmail: Yes, unlimited email accounts are included with webmail access and spam filtering.
faqContent.faqCanIHostWordPress: Yes, ScalaHosting offers optimized WordPress hosting with staging environments, LiteSpeed caching, and automatic updates.
faqContent.faqWhatsTheUptime: ScalaHosting guarantees 99.9% uptime with SLA credits for any downtime below this threshold.
faqContent.faqCanICancelAnytime: Yes, with a 30-day money-back guarantee for shared hosting and prorated refunds for VPS services.
